00020 #include "rmapimagediffrect.h"
00021 
00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace RMaps {
00023 
00024     RDK2_FACTORY(RMapImageDiffRect);
00025 
00026 
00027 RMapImageDiffRect::RMapImageDiffRect(RMapImage* mapImage, int left, int top, int width, int height) :
00028     ObjectDiff("RMapImage"),
00029     refMapImageX(mapImage->x), refMapImageY(mapImage->y), refMapImageTheta(mapImage->theta),
00030     refMapImageRealWidth(mapImage->realWidth)
00031 {
00032     imageDiffRect = new RImageDiffRect(mapImage->image, left, top, width, height);
00033 }
00034 
00035 RMapImageDiffRect::RMapImageDiffRect() :
00036     ObjectDiff("RMapImage"),
00037     refMapImageX(0.), refMapImageY(0.), refMapImageTheta(0.),
00038     refMapImageRealWidth(0.), imageDiffRect(0)
00039 { }
00040 
00041 RDK2::Object* RMapImageDiffRect::clone() const
00042 {
00043     RMapImageDiffRect* r = new RMapImageDiffRect(*this);
00044     r->imageDiffRect = imageDiffRect ? (RImageDiffRect*) imageDiffRect->clone() : 0;
00045     return r;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void RMapImageDiffRect::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00049 {
00050     r->startReading(getClassName());
00051         objectClassName = r->readString();
00052         refMapImageX = r->read_f64();
00053         refMapImageY = r->read_f64();
00054         refMapImageTheta = r->read_f64();
00055         refMapImageRealWidth = r->read_f64();
00056         imageDiffRect = (RImageDiffRect*) r->readObject();
00057     r->doneReading();
00058 }
00059 
00060 void RMapImageDiffRect::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00061 {
00062     if(!imageDiffRect)
00063         throw WritingException("Cannot serialize if imageDiffRect is 0.");
00064         
00065     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00066         w->writeString(objectClassName);
00067         w->write_f64(refMapImageX);
00068         w->write_f64(refMapImageY);
00069         w->write_f64(refMapImageTheta);
00070         w->write_f64(refMapImageRealWidth);
00071         w->writeObject(true, imageDiffRect);
00072     w->doneWriting();
00073 }
00074 
00075 vector<ObjectDiff*> RMapImageDiffRect::split(size_t maxSize)
00076 {
00077     vector<ObjectDiff*> ret;
00078     vector<ObjectDiff*> v = imageDiffRect->split(maxSize);
00079     for (size_t i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
00080         RMapImageDiffRect* curDiff = new RMapImageDiffRect(*this);
00081         curDiff->imageDiffRect = dynamic_cast<RImageDiffRect*>(v[i]);
00082         ret.push_back(curDiff);
00083     }
00084     return ret;
00085 }
